text.codebreaker.guide.guess_the_code: Guess the hidden code by selecting colors!
text.codebreaker.guide.guessing_gives_re: A failed guess will show hits, blows, and misses.
text.codebreaker.guide.acacia_button_ind: An acacia button indicates a hit; one guessed color is in the correct spot.
text.codebreaker.guide.stone_button_indi: A stone button indicates a blow; one guessed color is present on the actual code.
text.codebreaker.guide.birch_button_indi: A birch button indicates a miss; one guessed color is not present on the actual code.
text.codebreaker.lose: Nobody won the game within %s rounds!
